modName: TSTP - Body Texture with Shiny Tattoo and Bodyslide - DELETED
summary: Custom Skin Texture Pack With Shiny Tattoos
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana]I recommend to use this retexture with a race like Temptress or whatever you have,
so only you have this "special" skin texture and not every single female npc.
If you copy these files into your
Data / Textures / Actors / Character / Female
every single female npc will have these textures.
[/font]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85873-3-1502366242.jpg[/img]
[size=3][font=Courier New][b][font=Courier New]
___INSTALL:
[/font][/b][font=Verdana]Select whatever skin texture you want from:
---The Sexy Texture Project - Muscle Structure Pack
(More Muscle, Muscle, Normal, Smooth)
---The Sexy Texture Project - Skin Pack
(Goosebumps, Sopping, Glossy)
and place the .dds files into your texture folder.
[/font][/font]
[font=Courier New][b]___ENB SETTINGS:[/b][/font]
[font=Verdana]To change the amount of glossiness of the body and tattoos, open your ENB GUI
and scroll down to ENVIROMENT.
Look for SpecularAmountMultiplier and SpecularPowerMultiplier. 
Recommened settings: 1-5
Above 10+ you get the oily look, which is nice but covers the sweat textures.
Make sure the IgnoreWeatherSystem is enabled.[/font][/size]

The tattoos are works the same as the sweat textures, gets shiny as the light reflect on it. I have painted them on 3 layers. One is on the sweat texture which gives the most effect, the other is on the muscle texture and also one on the main skin texture. Since the tattoos outline also on the muscle texture they can appaer as scars when there is less light in the enviroment.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85873-2-1502366242.jpg[/img]

My lighting setup:
Interior - ELFX
Exterior - Vivid Weathers + Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics
Rudy ENB
[center]
My Custom Warpaints:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85996?]Senua's Warpaint
[/url][/center]
[center][/center]
author: kilateone
